dcterms:description: Channel dataset established for evaluation using ray tracing simulation, which projects rays from the base station to the physical environment and calculates channel path information including path gain, angle-of-arrival (AoA), and angle-of-departure (AoD) between the base station and vehicles.
dcterms:title: Channel dataset from ray tracing simulation

dcterms:creator: Y. Wang
A. Klautau
M. Ribero
A. C. Soong
R. W. Heath
dcterms:description: AoD distribution derived from channel realizations, used to optimize the CS matrix for beam alignment in mmWave vehicular communication.
dcterms:title: AoD distribution from channel realizations

dcterms:creator: R. Beran
et al.
dcterms:description: Statistical distance measure used to evaluate the convergence of the estimated AoD distribution with the ground truth.
dcterms:title: Statistical distance measure - Hellinger distance

dcterms:creator: J. A. Tropp
A. C. Gilbert
dcterms:description: Channel measurements used for beam alignment, which are obtained through compressive sensing techniques.
dcterms:title: Channel measurements for beam alignment
